item.title: Quantitative Analytics and Trading Strategies
item.description: This project develops an intelligent data driven application to monitor blockchain projects and to analyze cryptoassets from both utility and speculation perspectives.

item.title: Derivatives Market
item.description: Perspectives on derivatives market, from commodities and stocks to cryptoassets, particularly in Mercantile Exchange of Vietnam.
